documents.document: I'm dying at @JamesKavanagh_ snapping about his cup of tea saying "now you want to lift the tea bag out like it has a neck injury" 😂😂

@CharKennedy94 @DanLauraCurtis Just the truth, girl. Lots of their music would really suit your voice. 😊

Guys, if you want a little more lols in your life, follow @Eims_m on social media. She's only gas. 👏🏼
@Eims_m @elliegoulding Haha, whether she likes it or not, she organised a gig with me and it was a raging success. 😂😂👍🏼
Didn't go to sleep 'til 3am. Knackered! But dreamt I was planning a gig with @elliegoulding so you know, you win some, you lose some.
Politics isn't often about love & compassion but imagine if it were. Imagine if love & compassion were as important… https://t.co/92vgJapAjq

I love this. https://t.co/DkxyWGv2fm
Guys, you should follow @julescarbonara, & on snapchat too. Funny, entertaining, so informative with food & healthy eating, & just lovely!
Love this! Got to keep going 😊🙌🏼👍🏼 https://t.co/qVzDqZN5iL
@IamTatey @A_P_M I'm actually disappointed in myself for calling you Ian. Why did I do that?! Soz Tatey. Tatey for evs. 😉😊
@A_P_M @IamTatey That probably means you have a creative brain! I always try to pronounce car registration plates. Like 904 would be 'Nof' 😂
@IamTatey @A_P_M Do you guys know each other? Small world. 🌎 Ian made us all pee ourselves every day on that show! 😂
@A_P_M Haha, I can imagine people being confused by it in conversation but so what, keep saying it, we understand it! 😂👍🏼🌱🌱🌱🌱
